sentences.en: Diligence and thrift made him a possessor of warm fortunes.
Diligence combined with natural ability earned him commendations from superiors.
sentences.cn: 勤奋加上天赋,使他受到了上司们的好评.

sentences.en: Diligence is the key to success.
Diligence is the mother of good luck.
Diligence is the path leading to happiness.
sentences.cn: 勤劳是获得幸福的途径.

sentences.en: Genius is nothing but labor and diligence.
sentences.cn: 天才无非是工作和勤奋。

sentences.en: He exhorted his companions, 'Try to accomplish your aim with diligence'.
sentences.cn: 他劝诫同伴说：“要通过勤奋努力实现自己的目标。”

sentences.en: He exhorted his companions, "Try to accomplish your aim with diligence".
sentences.cn: 他劝诫同伴说：“要通过勤奋努力实现自己的目标。”

sentences.en: Her diligence must have something to do with his success.
sentences.cn: 她的勤勉和她的成功一定有某些关系.

sentences.en: Honesty and diligence should be your permanent partner.
sentences.cn: 诚实和勤勉，应该成为你永久的伴侣。

sentences.en: I know no such things as genius; it is nothing but labor and diligence.
sentences.cn: 我不知道有天才这种东西；它只是劳动和勤奋的结果。

sentences.en: If your talent combines with diligence, you can excel in your pursuit.
sentences.cn: 如果你把天赋与勤奋结合起来, 你所追求的事业便会出类拔萃.

sentences.en: In Roman law two levels of diligence were recognized.
sentences.cn: 在罗马法中,有两种等级的谨慎.

sentences.en: She shows great diligence in her schoolwork.
The principle of diligence and frugality applies to all undertakings.
sentences.cn: 勤俭节约的原则适用于一切事业.

sentences.en: We should cultivate the good habits of diligence and frugality.
sentences.cn: 我们要养成勤俭节约的好风气.

words.tran_cn: 勤勉的；用功的，费尽心血的

trans.tran_en: careful and thorough work or effort
